title: 1994 Norwegian Third Division
text:
The 1994 season of the "<a href="3.%20divisjon">3. divisjon</a>", the fourth highest <a href="association%20football">association football</a> league for men in <a href="Norway">Norway</a>.
Between 22 and 24 games (depending on group size) were played in 19 groups, with 3 points given for wins and 1 for draws. All group winners were promoted to the <a href="2.%20divisjon">2. divisjon</a>.
